languages.text: {n}Октавиана деликатно улыбается.{/n} "Подруги? Она — мой злейший враг, мстительный дух воздаяния, посланный в наказание за грехи юности. У госпожи Хейдари есть особый дар сбивать меня с толку и втягивать в неприятности. Лишь ее привычка отчаянно сорить деньгами и платить за разбитую посуду втрое удерживают меня от того, чтобы не запретить ей навек посещение "Амасекуса".

{n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана деликатно улыбается.{/n} "Подруги? Она — мой злейший враг, мстительный дух воздаяния, посланный в наказание за грехи юности. У госпожи Хейдари есть особый дар сбивать меня с толку и втягивать в неприятности. Лишь ее привычка отчаянно сорить деньгами и платить за разбитую посуду втрое удерживают меня от того, чтобы не запретить ей навек посещение "Амасекуса".

I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“朋友？她简直是我的祸水。肯定是老天为了惩罚我年轻时的过失，才把这个灾星派到了我身边。海达利女士有着相当特别的天赋，总是能让我的人生脱轨，把我卷入麻烦之中。要不是因为她喜欢像撒纸一样撒钱，而且无论打破什么东西，都会按三倍的价格赔偿的话，我早就把她从烈酒修会里撵出去了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“朋友？她简直是我的祸水。肯定是老天为了惩罚我年轻时的过失，才把这个灾星派到了我身边。海达利女士有着相当特别的天赋，总是能让我的人生脱轨，把我卷入麻烦之中。要不是因为她喜欢像撒纸一样撒钱，而且无论打破什么东西，都会按三倍的价格赔偿的话，我早就把她从烈酒修会里撵出去了。”

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは微笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}「友人？彼女は私の最悪の敵であり、私の若さゆえの罪を罰するために遣わされた復讐の魂ですよ。ミストレス・ヘイダリには、私のバランスを崩し、困難に引きずり込む特別な才能があるのです。紙吹雪のように金をばらまき、壊したものには3倍の金を払うという彼女の習慣がなければ、私はとっくに彼女をアマセカスから締め出していたでしょうね」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナは微笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}「友人？彼女は私の最悪の敵であり、私の若さゆえの罪を罰するために遣わされた復讐の魂ですよ。ミストレス・ヘイダリには、私のバランスを崩し、困難に引きずり込む特別な才能があるのです。紙吹雪のように金をばらまき、壊したものには3倍の金を払うという彼女の習慣がなければ、私はとっくに彼女をアマセカスから締め出していたでしょうね」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sonríe de oreja a oreja.{/n} «¿Amiga? Es mi peor enemiga, un espíritu de venganza enviado a castigarme mis indiscreciones juveniles. La señora Heydari tiene un don para descolocarme y meterme en apuros. Tendría prohibida la entrada en el Amasecus si no fuera porque reparte dinero como si fueran caramelos y paga por cualquier cosa que rompa por triplicado».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana sonríe de oreja a oreja.{/n} «¿Amiga? Es mi peor enemiga, un espíritu de venganza enviado a castigarme mis indiscreciones juveniles. La señora Heydari tiene un don para descolocarme y meterme en apuros. Tendría prohibida la entrada en el Amasecus si no fuera porque reparte dinero como si fueran caramelos y paga por cualquier cosa que rompa por triplicado».

languages.text: {n}Octaviana vous adresse un sourire délicat.{/n} « Amie ? C'est ma pire ennemie, l'esprit vengeur envoyé me punir pour les péchés de ma jeunesse. Maîtresse Heydari a un don tout particulier pour me déstabiliser et me causer des problèmes. Si elle n'aimait pas autant distribuer son argent comme des bonbons et payer triple tout ce qu'elle casse, je l'aurais bannie de l'Amasecus il y a bien longtemps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana vous adresse un sourire délicat.{/n} « Amie ? C'est ma pire ennemie, l'esprit vengeur envoyé me punir pour les péchés de ma jeunesse. Maîtresse Heydari a un don tout particulier pour me déstabiliser et me causer des problèmes. Si elle n'aimait pas autant distribuer son argent comme des bonbons et payer triple tout ce qu'elle casse, je l'aurais bannie de l'Amasecus il y a bien longtemps. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana reagiert mit einem verschmitztem Lächeln.{/n} "Befreundet? Sie ist mein schlimmster Feind, ein Rachegeist der Vergeltung, geschickt, um mich für die Sünden in meiner Jugend zu bestrafen. Herrin Heydari hat die besondere Gabe, meine Welt auf den Kopf zu stellen und mich in Schwierigkeiten zu bringen. Ich hätte ihr schon längst Hausverbot im Amasecus verpasst, aber sie wirft nun mal mit Geld wie mit Konfetti um sich und bezahlt das Dreifache für alles, was sie kaputt macht."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."

Sie ist mein schlimmster Feind, ein Rachegeist der Vergeltung, geschickt, um mich für die Sünden in meiner Jugend zu bestrafen. Herrin Heydari hat die besondere Gabe, meine Welt auf den Kopf zu stellen und mich in Schwierigkeiten zu bringen. Ich hätte ihr schon längst Hausverbot im Amasecus verpasst, aber sie wirft nun mal mit Geld wie mit Konfetti um sich und bezahlt das Dreifache für alles, was sie kaputt macht."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sana hınzırca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Arkadaş mı? O benim en büyük düşmanım; gençliğimde işlediğim suçlar için bana gönderilmiş, intikamcı bir hayalet. Üstat Heydari'nin dengemi şaşırtmak ve beni zor durumlara sokmak konusunda olağanüstü bir yeteneği vardır. Etrafa konfeti gibi para saçma ve kırdığı her şeyin parasını üç katıyla ödeme alışkanlığı olmasa Amasekus'a girişini uzun zaman önce yasaklamıştım."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you an arch smile.{/n} "Friends? She is my worst enemy, the vengeful spirit of retribution sent to punish me for my youthful transgressions. Mistress Heydari has a special gift for knocking me off balance and dragging me into difficulty. I would have barred her from the Amasecus long ago if it weren't for her habit of tossing money around like confetti, and of paying triple for anything she breaks."
